mapper.select: select CATE_NO, CATE_DIVISION_NAME, CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL, CATE_SECTION_NAME, CATE_SECTION_LEVEL, CATE_VALUE from bi_category where CATE_DIVISION_NAME = #{value} order by CATE_SECTION_LEVEL
select distinct CATE_DIVISION_NAME, CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL from bi_category order by CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL
